name: Plot Armor (Julia, Rui Caldeira)
description:
This game was made for the Game Off jam 2022 - theme cliche

A game where you level up through almost dying

You're the main character, and as the main character, you have plot armor. Even if you die, not only do you get back up, but you're somehow now stronger!

Made in collaboration with https://ruipcc.itch.io/

Credits:

Start screen background image: https://www.deviantart.com/r4ft3l

Health bar: https://adwitr.itch.io/pixel-health-bar-asset-pack

Main character: https://oco.itch.io/medieval-fantasy-character-pack

Enemies: https://cleancutgames.itch.io/

Final boss: https://darkpixel-kronovi.itch.io/undead-executioner

Tilesets: https://shackhal.itch.io/multi-platformer-tileset
